Description.Text: Ambasadori is a charming 4-star hotel offering elegant accommodation in the heart of Tbilisi. Highlights include onsite dining, free Wi-Fi, a rooftop swimming pool and an excellent location steps from Anchiskhati Church. Freedom Square is located in the centre of Tbilisi at the eastern end of Rustaveli Avenue. Nearby places of interest include Anchiskhati Church, Narikala Fortress, Sioni Cathedral and the Presidential Palace. Freedom Square metro station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Tbilisi destinations. The hotel is housed in an elegant mid-rise building featuring balconies, decorative pillars and arches and a part glass roof. Facilities include a rooftop swimming pool and a small winter garden with a glass roof. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are decorated in an elegant style with red and neutral tones, carpeted floors, dark wood furniture and tasteful artwork above the bed. Amenities include air-conditioning, a flat-screen satellite TV, mini-bar, work desk and an en-suite bathroom. Some rooms feature a balcony and views of the city. The hotel restaurant offers Georgian and international cuisine in a Mediterranean style rooftop dining room with an adjoining terrace boasting views of the river, The Bridge of Peace and the Presidential Palace. Guests can enjoy a range of drinks in a friendly atmosphere at the hotel bar which boasts stylish brown leather chairs and sofas and colourful murals. Free parking is possible onsite. The hotel has a 24-hour reception and offers a chargeable airport shuttle service.
